ooo_row.name: Alpha
ooo_row.definition: I have a diver down, keep well clear at slow speed
ooo_row.two_flags: A + C = I am abandoning my vessel
ooo_row.three_flags: A + N + 1 = I need a doctor, I have severe burns

ooo_row.name: Bravo
ooo_row.definition: I am taking on or discharging explosives
ooo_row.two_flags: B + R = I require a helicopter urgently
ooo_row.three_flags: B + B + 1 = You may alight on deck; I am ready to receive you forward.

ooo_row.name: Charlie
ooo_row.definition: (Affirmative)
ooo_row.two_flags: N + C = I am in distress
ooo_row.three_flags: C + B + 6 = I require immediate assistance, I am on fire

ooo_row.name: Delta
ooo_row.definition: Keep clear, I am maneuvering with difficulty
ooo_row.two_flags: D + V = I am drifting
ooo_row.three_flags: D + H + 1 = I have no motor boat

ooo_row.name: Echo
ooo_row.definition: I am altering my course to starboard
ooo_row.two_flags: E + X = My position is doubtful
ooo_row.three_flags: E + U + 1 = What is your present position?

ooo_row.name: Foxtrot
ooo_row.definition: I am disabled, communicate with me.
ooo_row.two_flags: F + M = Visual contact with vessel is not continuous
ooo_row.three_flags: F + C + 1 = You should indicate your position by rockets or flares

ooo_row.name: Golf
ooo_row.definition: I require a pilot
ooo_row.two_flags: G + Z = all persons saved
ooo_row.three_flags: G + C + 1 = Search results are negative. Continuing search

ooo_row.name: Hotel
ooo_row.definition: I have a pilot on board
ooo_row.two_flags: H + V = have you been in a collision?
ooo_row.three_flags: H + X + 7 = I have collided with floating ice

ooo_row.name: India
ooo_row.definition: I am altering my course to port.
ooo_row.two_flags: I + T = I am on fire
ooo_row.three_flags: I + B + 1 = My vessel is seriously damaged

ooo_row.name: Juliet
ooo_row.definition: I am leaking dangerous cargo
ooo_row.two_flags: J + L = You are running the risk of going aground
ooo_row.three_flags: J + D + 2 = Explosion has occurred in cargo

ooo_row.name: Kilo
ooo_row.definition: I wish to communicate with you
ooo_row.two_flags: K + C = My hold is flooded
ooo_row.three_flags: K + Q + 1 = I am ready to be taken in tow

ooo_row.name: Lima
ooo_row.definition: You should stop your vessel instantly
ooo_row.two_flags: J + L = You are running the risk of going aground
ooo_row.three_flags: L + Z + 3 = What is the state of the channel?

ooo_row.name: Mike
ooo_row.definition: My vessel is stopped and making no headway
ooo_row.two_flags: U + M = the harbor is closed to traffic
ooo_row.three_flags: M + Y + 6 = It is dangerous to approach my vessel

ooo_row.name: November
ooo_row.definition: (Negative)
ooo_row.two_flags: N + C = I am in distress
ooo_row.three_flags: A + N + 1 = I need a doctor, I have severe burns

ooo_row.name: Oscar
ooo_row.definition: Man overboard
ooo_row.two_flags: S + O = You should stop your vessel immediately.
ooo_row.three_flags: O + S + 1 = You should keep a lookout for mines.

ooo_row.name: Papa
ooo_row.definition: All aboard, vessel is about to proceed to sea, a.k.a., the Blue Peter
ooo_row.two_flags: P + D = Your navigation lights are not visible
ooo_row.three_flags: P + O + 8 = You should travel under my stern.

ooo_row.name: Quebec
ooo_row.definition: My vessel is healthy and I request free practique (permission to enter port with assurance that the ship is free from contagious disease)
ooo_row.two_flags: Q + T = I am going astern
ooo_row.three_flags: K + Q + 1 = I am ready to be taken in tow

ooo_row.name: Romeo
ooo_row.definition: The way is off my ship
ooo_row.two_flags: B + R = I require a helicopter urgently
ooo_row.three_flags: R + D + 2 = I am unable to weigh my anchor.

ooo_row.name: Sierra
ooo_row.definition: My engines are going full-speed astern
ooo_row.two_flags: S + O = You should stop your vessel immediately.
ooo_row.three_flags: S + U + 5 = My cargo is livestock.

ooo_row.name: Tango
ooo_row.definition: Do not pass ahead of me
ooo_row.two_flags: Q + T = I am going astern
ooo_row.three_flags: T + E + 2 = I am long-line fishing.

ooo_row.name: Uniform
ooo_row.definition: You are running into danger
ooo_row.two_flags: U + M = the harbor is closed to traffic
ooo_row.three_flags: U + Q + 1 = You should wait outside the harbor until daylight.

ooo_row.name: Victor
ooo_row.definition: I require assistance (not in distress)
ooo_row.two_flags: H + V = have you been in a collision?
ooo_row.three_flags: V + C + 2 = Where can I find coal nearby?

ooo_row.name: Whiskey
ooo_row.definition: I require medical assistance
ooo_row.two_flags: W + C = Vessel is fast on ice and needs an icebreaker.
ooo_row.three_flags: W + P + 1 = Barometer is falling rapidly.

ooo_row.name: X-ray
ooo_row.definition: Stop carrying out your intentions and wait for my signal
ooo_row.two_flags: X + O = Visibility is expected to decrease.
ooo_row.three_flags: X + T + 1 = Weather expected is good.

ooo_row.name: Yankee
ooo_row.definition: I am dragging my anchor
ooo_row.two_flags: Y + N = Cancel my last signal.
ooo_row.three_flags: M + Y + 6 = It is dangerous to approach my vessel

ooo_row.name: Zulu
ooo_row.definition: I require a tug
ooo_row.two_flags: Z + L = your signal has been received but not understood
ooo_row.three_flags: L + Z + 3 = What is the state of the channel?

ooo_row.name: One
ooo_row.definition: Used to communicate numeric information or to give greater detail when using combinations of Alpha flags.
ooo_row.three_flags: A + N + 1 = I need a doctor, I have severe burns

ooo_row.name: Two
ooo_row.definition: Used to communicate numeric information or to give greater detail when using combinations of Alpha flags.
ooo_row.three_flags: J + D + 2 = Explosion has occurred in cargo

ooo_row.name: Three
ooo_row.definition: Used to communicate numeric information or to give greater detail when using combinations of Alpha flags.
ooo_row.three_flags: L + Z + 3 = What is the state of the channel?

ooo_row.name: Four
ooo_row.definition: Used to communicate numeric information or to give greater detail when using combinations of Alpha flags.
ooo_row.three_flags: N + E + 4 = You should proceed with great caution; keep clear of firing range

ooo_row.name: Five
ooo_row.definition: Used to communicate numeric information or to give greater detail when using combinations of Alpha flags.
ooo_row.three_flags: S + U + 5 = My cargo is livestock.

ooo_row.name: Six
ooo_row.definition: Used to communicate numeric information or to give greater detail when using combinations of Alpha flags.
ooo_row.three_flags: M + Y + 6 = It is dangerous to approach my vessel

ooo_row.name: Seven
ooo_row.definition: Used to communicate numeric information or to give greater detail when using combinations of Alpha flags.
ooo_row.three_flags: H + X + 7 = I have collided with floating ice

ooo_row.name: Eight
ooo_row.definition: Used to communicate numeric information or to give greater detail when using combinations of Alpha flags.
ooo_row.three_flags: C + B + 8 = I require immediate assistance: my propeller shaft is broken.

ooo_row.name: Nine
ooo_row.definition: Used to communicate numeric information or to give greater detail when using combinations of Alpha flags.
ooo_row.three_flags: I + A + 9 = I have received damage to my propellers.

ooo_row.name: Zero
ooo_row.definition: Used to communicate numeric information or to give greater detail when using combinations of Alpha flags.
ooo_row.three_flags: V + S + 0 = The ice is not obstructing navigation.

ooo_row.name: First Substitute
ooo_row.definition: Repeat the flag that appears in the first position in this hoist.

ooo_row.name: Second Substitute
ooo_row.definition: Repeat the flag that appears in the second position in this hoist.

ooo_row.name: Third Substitute
ooo_row.definition: Repeat the flag that appears in the third position in this hoist.

ooo_row.name: Fourth Substitute
ooo_row.definition: Repeat the flag that appears in the fourth position in this hoist.
